string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Added a new experimental "Acrylic Blur" effect for a modern, semi-transparent UI. You can enable it in Settings. 
 - Tapping the mini-player (Floating Action Button) now expands it, while a long press takes you to the console. This behavior can be toggled in settings. 
 - Significantly improved app startup speed and overall performance by centralizing how settings are loaded. 
 - Improved handling of screen padding and system cutouts (notches/insets) for a more consistent look. 
 - Adopted the latest Kotlin features and updated internal libraries for better stability.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
